00018 void NonmemTranslator::parsePred( const DOMElement * pred )
00019 {

00022   int size = XMLString::stringLen( xml_pred_def );
00023

00029   fclose( nm_in );

00031

00039

00043     {
00044       char m[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];

00047         "Syntax error(s) found in PRED definition.\n%s",
